entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
